zonesFollowMaster.title: Set ALL Zones to Master Temp on Master Temp Change
zonesFollowMaster.description: Sets 'Control All Zones' for master temp changes. Recommended to leave this setting on.

zonesPushMaster.title: Adjust Master Temp if Zone Set Outside of Permitted Thresholds
zonesPushMaster.description: If zone is set outside of allowed +/- 2 degree variance then push the master temp to allow setting

clientName.title: Client Name
clientName.description: Used to register plugin on Que Cloud as an 'Authorised Device' & default HomeKit name.

refreshInterval.title: Periodic Refresh Interval
refreshInterval.description: Time in seconds to refresh device state information from Que API and in HomeKit.

deviceSerial.title: Que System Serial Number
deviceSerial.description: Only required if you have multiple systems in your Que cloud account.
deviceSerial.placeholder: Leave Blank If You Have A Single Que System - Plugin Will Auto Discover
